    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs=""
>
[Elven Absinthe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=631)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Drug" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=261" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 121</row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Specialists in Kyonin prepare this emerald-green beverage.

**Saving Throw** DC 20 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 hour; **Maximum Duration** 1 day; **Stage 1** +2 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks (1 hour); **Stage 2** [drained 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 hour); **Stage 3** [stupefied 4](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 hour)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Elven Absinthe
